summary: Enabling VRDE, setting port and address for Ubuntu 16.04 VM.

details.comment: Enabling VRDE, setting port and address for Ubuntu 16.04 VM.
details.content: vboxmanage modifyvm "Ubuntu 16.04" --vrde on --vrdeport 8981 --vrdeaddress 127.0.0.1 --vrdeauthtype null --vrdemulticon on --audioout off
